history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04827
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REGULATING THE OPERATION OF DRONES OR REMOTELY-PILOTED AIRCRAFT SYSTEMS (RPAS) AND PRESCRIBING PENALTIES FOR VIOLATIONS THEREOF AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : " Drone Regulation Act "
ABSTRACT : Provides that no individual shall operate a drone or RPAS unless he or she has undergone education in safe airspace practices or operating remote-controlled aircraft; States that the the Civil Aviation Authority of the Phils. shall undertake the seminar and issue the necessary certificate of completion with regards to such education.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2017-01-25
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION ON 2017-02-01
